## SmartContract.methodsExplicit property

This object contains a function for each endpoint defined by the contract. (a bit similar to web3js's "contract.methods").

**Signature:**

```typescript
readonly methodsExplicit: {
        [key: string]: (args?: TypedValue[]) => Interaction;
    };
```
